official_title: A bill to amend the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to specify the method of determining State allotments.

summary.text: Amends the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to specify the State allotment formula which the Secretary of Health and Human Services is required to use when implementing a presidential order requiring the sequestration (through the application of a reduction percentage) of budget authority provided for a fiscal year under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to specify the method of determining State allotments.
